Package sceneObjects

Interface Summary
ISceneObject This interface represents the objects to be used in the scene (i.e spehre , box).
 

Class Summary
AnotatedTriangle This mini-class represents a triangle, which also knows the indexes (at the vertex array) of his points.
Box This class represents a Box which consists of 6 rectangles.
Camera This class represents the Camera of the scene.
Cylinder This class represents the cylinder scene object (finite non capped cylinder).
Disc This class represents a dist scene object.
Mesh This class represents a mesh object which consists of triangles (supports 'off' and 'ply2' formats).
Rectangle This class represents the rectangle scene object.
SceneObject This abstract class holds all the shared functionality for all scene objects.
Sphere This class represents the sphere scene object.
Triangle This class represents the triangle scene object.
